Reviews.Title: I just love it!
Reviews.Author: Jesus Tiburcio Del Rosario
Reviews.Content: I have bought this kit and is amazing, but The tripode is not as good as my cnew camera needs, but all the thing are acceptable

ProductInfo.Features:
Canon EOS 60D Body SLR Digital Camera Body
Canon EF-S 18-55mm f/3.5-5.6 IS II Autofocus Lens & Canon Zoom Telephoto EF 75-300mm f/4.0-5.6 III Autofocus Lens
Full Size Tripod, Carrying Case
Replacement LP-E6 Battery, External Rapid Travel Charger with Car Adapter
16GB SDHC Card, Card Reader, HDMI Cable, Cleaning Kit, Sunset Electronics Exclusive Cleaning Cloth
ProductInfo.Name: Canon EOS 60D SLR Digital Camera Kit with Canon EF-S 18-55mm IS and EF 75-300mm lenses Including Extra LP-E6 Repalcement Battery & Travel Charger, 16GB SDHC Memory Card, Tripod & Professional Carrying Case and much much more...
